product.title: Groom Beard Balm Citrus 60 ml in Multi
product.body_html: A rich ointment for the proudly bearded. GROOM beard balm is a blend of rich and highly beneficial ingredients, such as beeswax, shea butter and argan oil. It deeply nourishes the beard, protects it from the elements and helps keeping stray hair in check. Recommended for beard worn medium to long, or very coarse and dry.
